settings.title: Important information about Bed Rocker Feet
settings.content:
Sleepytroll Bed Rocker Feet comes with 4 screws (pre-drilling required) and can only be mounted on cribs with wooden legs.

Maximum weight of the crib itself should not exceed 22 kg (excluding bedding, mattress, and baby) to facilitate a proper rocking motion.Â 

We do not recommend using the Bed Rocker Feet on the crib once your baby can stand.

settings.content: Sleepytroll is a versitaile rocking tool that can be used not only for strollers, but also cribs and cots.

1 x Sleepytroll smart baby rocker

settings.title: We take safety seriously
settings.content:
Sleepytroll is safety tested by TÃV, one of the worldâs leading testing service providers.

Complies with CE and FCC regulations regarding exposure to electromagnetic fields and is ROHS (Reduction of Hazardous Substances) compliant. Sleepytroll uses safe NiMH batteries (not lithium). Sleepytroll can be safely taken on a plane.
